title: Use these 3 pumpkin-carving tricks to save Halloween
text:
If you’re not doing these three things, you’re carving your pumpkin wrong!
>> Read more trending stories
Enjoy your jack-o-lantern all season with these tricks for scooping out seeds, keeping your pumpkin from drying out and keeping it fresher (and germ-free) longer!
Watch the video below.
